column1: Ilansky District (Russian: Ила́нский райо́н) is an administrative and municipal district (raion)
column2: one of the forty-three in Krasnoyarsk Krai
column3: Russia. It is located in the southeast of the krai and borders with Abansky District in the north
column7: and with Kansky District in the west. The area of the district is 3
column9: 450 sq mi). Its administrative center is the town of Ilansky. Population: 25
column10: 899 (2010 Census). The population of the administrative center accounts for 62.2% of the district's total population.

column1: The district was founded on November 7

column2: the Head of the District and the Chairman of the District Council is Olga A. Alkhimenko.

column1: The Trans-Siberian Railway runs through the district from west to east. A part of M53 Highway passes through the district as well.
